local_intent: Approach by moving to an overhead pre-push pose above the T-block (offset_z=0.02) and verify arrival.
assumptions: The 'IsAt' check uses the named target reference associated with t_block.
Numeric values (800, 1200, 0.02) are chosen from the allowed bins.
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveAbove phase of the global sequence after perception; prepares for subsequent align, contact, and push steps.
